alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Geauga and Lake Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 32 miles northwest of Perry to near Fairport Harbor to near Euclid. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Euclid, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Madison, Perry, Timberlake, Lakeline, Wickliffe, Richmond Heights, Willoughby Hills, Highland Heights, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Kirtland, Mayfield and Gates Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
